children.text: Please select a subject to view the courses

children.defaultOptionValue: {{ ((options, serverSideFiltering) => ( appsmith.store.course ? appsmith.store.levels.filter(l => l.name === appsmith.store.course.Level)[0].id : ''))(sel_levels.options, sel_levels.serverSideFiltering) }}
{{ ((options, serverSideFiltering) => ( appsmith.store.course ? appsmith.store.types.filter(t => t.name === appsmith.store.course.Type)[0].id : ''))(sel_type.options, sel_type.serverSideFiltering) }}

layoutOnLoadActions.name: utils.getCourseBySubject
utils.getSubjects
utils.init
